_Michael Barrish_: Home[1]. “Had I been given a choice in the matter, I 
would have preferred a name that made people think of things I considered more 
central to my identity, like “artist” or “intellectual” 
or “outrageously good in bed.””



[1] http://oblivio.com/road/02100401.shtml
